# Any of genus {{taxfmt|Valerianella|genus}} of [[cornsalad]]s and their closest relatives.
types.html:
valérianelle f (plural valérianelles)

  1. Any of genus Valerianella of cornsalads and their closest relatives.
trans: Any of genus Valerianella of cornsalads and their closest relatives.
